name: Arrogant
description: This work describes phenomena in religious life. Feeling the most right and easy to convert even hostile to other groups that are not in line with it, including in fact the same religion but have a different angle, they easily classify who is entitled to go to heaven and who will later go to hell. In this work I use the main object that is carrying hammers and scales inscribed with heaven and hell as if the law and fate of a person are in his hands, describing the attitude of man who always judged other humans, then reinforced again with the writings of infidels”kafir” and holly crossed out describing so bitterly he to punish others as if heaven and hell were in his hands.
